sentence.Network_en: All hearts beat with disquietude, save only the heart of Michel Arden.
sentence.Network_cn: 每一颗心都急得怦怦乱跳, 只有米歇尔·阿当是一个例外.

sentence.Network_en: The lines of his fastidious face showed a vague disquietude.
sentence.Network_cn: 那过分讲究的面孔上的表情是一种隐隐的不安.

sentence.Network_en: The disquietude of his air, the somewhat apprehensive impatience of his manner, surprised me.
sentence.Network_cn: 他神情不安, 急躁的举止中有点担忧, 这使我吃了一惊.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... disproportion 不相称 disquietude 不安 disregard 不理.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from disquiet, on the pattern of quietude

means.word_mean: 1. feelings of anxiety that make you tense and irritable
